body:
This is the "harvest" of one day on one normal-running node (31 messages):
```
2019-11-07T00:32:02Z ERROR: AcceptBlockHeader: prev block not found
2019-11-07T01:02:36Z ERROR: AcceptBlockHeader: Consensus::ContextualCheckBlockHeader: 000000000000014219120d5167a4281437fc379129d4ba6f6e956ca1db77f5fa, bad-diffbits, incorrect proof of work
2019-11-07T01:08:55Z ERROR: AcceptBlockHeader: Consensus::ContextualCheckBlockHeader: 000000004bfb561102f5f04d4bab0cc70a403da70b82ce33657e10ed46b9000f, bad-diffbits, incorrect proof of work
2019-11-07T01:56:13Z ERROR: AcceptBlockHeader: Consensus::ContextualCheckBlockHeader: 000000000000001daed8bac77bdf571441649e51732e91bec984cf97a39005a1, bad-diffbits, incorrect proof of work
2019-11-07T03:11:12Z ERROR: AcceptBlockHeader: Consensus::ContextualCheckBlockHeader: 00000000bdcf539dc39dce363d791103e80c8a7180dff3c9c8a4f25f3500b8c9, bad-diffbits, incorrect proof of work
2019-11-07T04:04:51Z ERROR: AcceptBlockHeader: Consensus::ContextualCheckBlockHeader: 000000004bfb561102f5f04d4bab0cc70a403da70b82ce33657e10ed46b9000f, bad-diffbits, incorrect proof of work
2019-11-07T04:05:45Z ERROR: AcceptBlockHeader: Consensus::CheckBlockHeader: 2d94a35159bf59897eb709534f707ac587112ef8e2db52a7c7153099e77cecf3, high-hash, proof of work failed
2019-11-07T04:16:24Z ERROR: AcceptBlockHeader: Consensus::ContextualCheckBlockHeader: 000000000000001daed8bac77bdf571441649e51732e91bec984cf97a39005a1, bad-diffbits, incorrect proof of work
2019-11-07T04:22:01Z ERROR: AcceptBlockHeader: Consensus::CheckBlockHeader: 0fd7ab36246daf61802e10a0316cc2b0f17a1d6404bfdd53878ba34e158b4680, high-hash, proof of work failed
2019-11-07T04:28:31Z ERROR: AcceptBlockHeader: Consensus::CheckBlockHeader: 0fd7ab36246daf61802e10a0316cc2b0f17a1d6404bfdd53878ba34e158b4680, high-hash, proof of work failed
2019-11-07T04:40:18Z ERROR: AcceptBlockHeader: Consensus::ContextualCheckBlockHeader: 000000004bfb561102f5f04d4bab0cc70a403da70b82ce33657e10ed46b9000f, bad-diffbits, incorrect proof of work
2019-11-07T04:54:09Z ERROR: AcceptBlockHeader: Consensus::ContextualCheckBlockHeader: 000000000000001daed8bac77bdf571441649e51732e91bec984cf97a39005a1, bad-diffbits, incorrect proof of work
2019-11-07T06:36:36Z ERROR: AcceptBlockHeader: Consensus::ContextualCheckBlockHeader: 000000004bfb561102f5f04d4bab0cc70a403da70b82ce33657e10ed46b9000f, bad-diffbits, incorrect proof of work
2019-11-07T08:06:25Z ERROR: AcceptBlockHeader: prev block not found
2019-11-07T08:35:49Z ERROR: AcceptBlockHeader: Consensus::ContextualCheckBlockHeader: 000000000000001daed8bac77bdf571441649e51732e91bec984cf97a39005a1, bad-diffbits, incorrect proof of work
2019-11-07T08:36:30Z ERROR: AcceptBlockHeader: Consensus::ContextualCheckBlockHeader: 00000000bdcf539dc39dce363d791103e80c8a7180dff3c9c8a4f25f3500b8c9, bad-diffbits, incorrect proof of work
2019-11-07T08:56:15Z ERROR: AcceptBlockHeader: Consensus::ContextualCheckBlockHeader: 000000000000001daed8bac77bdf571441649e51732e91bec984cf97a39005a1, bad-diffbits, incorrect proof of work
2019-11-07T09:39:10Z ERROR: AcceptBlockHeader: Consensus::CheckBlockHeader: 2d94a35159bf59897eb709534f707ac587112ef8e2db52a7c7153099e77cecf3, high-hash, proof of work failed
2019-11-07T10:12:22Z ERROR: AcceptBlockHeader: Consensus::CheckBlockHeader: 0fd7ab36246daf61802e10a0316cc2b0f17a1d6404bfdd53878ba34e158b4680, high-hash, proof of work failed
2019-11-07T10:25:25Z ERROR: AcceptBlockHeader: Consensus::ContextualCheckBlockHeader: 00000000bdcf539dc39dce363d791103e80c8a7180dff3c9c8a4f25f3500b8c9, bad-diffbits, incorrect proof of work
2019-11-07T11:56:59Z ERROR: AcceptBlockHeader: Consensus::ContextualCheckBlockHeader: 000000000000014219120d5167a4281437fc379129d4ba6f6e956ca1db77f5fa, bad-diffbits, incorrect proof of work
2019-11-07T13:59:09Z ERROR: AcceptBlockHeader: Consensus::ContextualCheckBlockHeader: 000000000000000000639be19a0123a1c99d9fef89f0b8ac055a77f4ef86ae3b, bad-diffbits, incorrect proof of work
2019-11-07T14:54:46Z ERROR: AcceptBlockHeader: Consensus::CheckBlockHeader: 0fd7ab36246daf61802e10a0316cc2b0f17a1d6404bfdd53878ba34e158b4680, high-hash, proof of work failed
2019-11-07T15:57:01Z ERROR: AcceptBlockHeader: Consensus::ContextualCheckBlockHeader: 000000000000014219120d5167a4281437fc379129d4ba6f6e956ca1db77f5fa, bad-diffbits, incorrect proof of work
2019-11-07T18:27:44Z ERROR: AcceptBlockHeader: Consensus::ContextualCheckBlockHeader: 000000000000000000639be19a0123a1c99d9fef89f0b8ac055a77f4ef86ae3b, bad-diffbits, incorrect proof of work
2019-11-07T18:50:31Z ERROR: AcceptBlockHeader: Consensus::CheckBlockHeader: 0fd7ab36246daf61802e10a0316cc2b0f17a1d6404bfdd53878ba34e158b4680, high-hash, proof of work failed
2019-11-07T19:58:57Z ERROR: AcceptBlockHeader: Consensus::ContextualCheckBlockHeader: 000000000000014219120d5167a4281437fc379129d4ba6f6e956ca1db77f5fa, bad-diffbits, incorrect proof of work
2019-11-07T20:29:11Z ERROR: AcceptBlockHeader: Consensus::ContextualCheckBlockHeader: 000000000000000000639be19a0123a1c99d9fef89f0b8ac055a77f4ef86ae3b, bad-diffbits, incorrect proof of work
2019-11-07T21:07:06Z ERROR: AcceptBlockHeader: prev block not found
2019-11-07T22:30:22Z ERROR: AcceptBlockHeader: prev block not found
2019-11-07T23:10:53Z ERROR: AcceptBlockHeader: prev block not found
```
That's a lot of ERROR.

Usually we follow the principle that we don't want to have any things in the log by default that might worry users unnecessarily. I *think* these are ERRORs which are easily to trigger on the P2P network by feeding invalid headers, we might want to tone them down to normal log messages or even hide them in a debug category.
title: ERROR AcceptBlockHeader log messages are kind of noisy
